Promo - Class in promo
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to promotion items.

PromoController - Class in promo
Contains the methods to create, update, remove, get and save promotion items.

Contains the exception PromoNotFoundException.
PromoNotFoundException() - Constructor for exception promo.exception.PromoNotFoundException

PromoUI - Class in promo
Displays the Promotion UI when the user selects Menu in the main UI.
PromoUI() - Constructor for class promo.PromoUI
